Node.Text: Shhhh! Lucy, don't tell him. He won't believe us anyway.
Oh, right. Well, in that case, we'll be off. Bye.
Node.Hint: Thomas and Lucy know something, and they're reluctant to share it.

Node.Text: I don't think, I know. There's going to be another murder tomorrow.
There's been a new victim every five days. Charles, then Alex, and then tomorrow marks the next five.
Thomas noticed the pattern awhile ago, but we didn't think it would go on this long...
Node.Hint: Thomas and Lucy recognized and deliberately hid the pattern of the murders.

Node.Text: No, but it's clear now that whoever's behind this has no intent of stopping.
We're keeping a low profile for the night, but please, if nothing else, be wary tonight and tomorrow. Who knows what will happen next?
Who do you think is next?
I bet it'll be Caroline, no one can be that sweet all the time.
Node.Hint: Lucy was quick to point out Caroline as a victim.

Node.Text: Exactly. Anyway, we're not going anywhere else tonight, so please watch yourself. Night.
